novel framework.from sentence: In this paper , we present a novel framework based on CNNs for simultaneous face detection , facial landmarks localization , head pose estimation and gender recognition from a given image ( see ) .

CNN architecture.from sentence: We design a CNN architecture to learn common features for these tasks and exploit the synergy among them .

set.from sentence: We refer the set of intermediate layer features as hyperfeatures .

separate fusion - CNN.from sentence: Hence , we construct a separate fusion - CNN to fuse the hyperfeatures .

tasks.from sentence: In order to learn the tasks , we train them simultaneously using multiple loss functions .

deep CNN.from sentence: The deep CNN combined with the fusion - CNN can be learned together in an end -toend fashion .
